long_description: Satisfy your fashionista side with the fun and stylish Teegan polarized sunglasses from Pepper's. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. Purple patchwork fade frames feature brown polarized lenses; white tortoise fade frames feature coffee polarized lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Large frames fit medium and large faces.
short_description: Satisfy your fashionista side with the fun and stylish Teegan polarized sunglasses from Pepper's.
